text: As part of Our Online Service, Easy Insight imports, stores and organizes data under the direction of its Customers.

Personal Information - We collect email addresses of those who communicate with Us via email, aggregate site information, and information you volunteer (such as your name, email address, company name, etc).

Personal Information - We collect email addresses of those who communicate with Us via email, aggregate site information, and information you volunteer (such as your name, email address, company name, etc).
We transfer information about you if Easy Insight is acquired by or merged with another company.

Easy Insight is subject to the investigatory and enforcement powers of the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) and may disclose personally identifiable information under special circumstances, such as to comply with subpoenas or when your actions violate the Terms of Service.
If you do not delete your User Content prior to account closure, Easy Insight may retain User Content for a commercially reasonable amount of time.
